Sentencas: The all porous solid oxide fuel cell concept is proposed to solve the carbon deposition problem of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Modeling of all porous solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The transport of oxygen molecules from the cathode to the fuel side through the porous electrolyte can resist carbon deposition but could reduce the fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Modeling of all porous solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, a two-dimensional model for all porous solid oxide button cells is developed for the first time.
Titulo: Modeling of all porous solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: After model validation with experimental data, the model is then extended for a tubular cell for parametric simulations.
Titulo: Modeling of all porous solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effects of operating conditions and the electrolyte microstructure properties on carbon resistance and electrochemical performance of all porous solid oxide fuel cells are examined.
Titulo: Modeling of all porous solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The good carbon resistance of all porous solid oxide fuel cell is numerically demonstrated.
Titulo: Modeling of all porous solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that the electrochemical performance and anode surface O/C ratio is significantly affected by anode inlet gas composition and flowrate.
Titulo: Modeling of all porous solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the anode supported all porous solid oxide fuel cell shows a great potential in terms of both power generation and coking resistance.
Titulo: Modeling of all porous solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results of this study form a solid foundation to understand the mechanism and promising future of all porous solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Modeling of all porous solid oxide fuel cells
